pages.text: 安山合金很容易制作，你只需要一块安山岩和一个铁粒。但由于手动制作被禁用，你不得不以较为困难（且昂贵）的方式来制作。你需要使用动力搅拌器，并且还需要一个齿轮来对它进行供能。

Because you can not buy cog wheels early game you will have to make one! First you need 3 things, a mechanical saw, a deloyer and a depot. Place the saw face up before dropping a log on it. Use a hand crank to spin the saw, this will strip the log. Now saw the stripped log, this will give you planks! Place the depot on the ground with the deployer 2 blocks above it, facing down.

Buy a shaft and put it on the depot. Give the deployer 1 plank, then use the hand crank to power the deployer. Once the plank is deployed onto the shaft you will have your self a cog wheel! Use the cog wheel to power the mixer and saw an iron ingot to get iron nuggets.
